# CLEENLY - Home Cleaning in Seattle Area

CLEENLY provides professional home cleaning services across the Greater Seattle Area, including the Eastside and South King County.

## Service Areas

We serve the following cities and their surrounding neighborhoods:
- **Seattle**: Capitol Hill, Ballard, Fremont, Queen Anne, West Seattle, Green Lake.
- **Bellevue**: Downtown, West Bellevue, Factoria, Somerset, Crossroads.
- **Kirkland**: Downtown, Juanita, Totem Lake, Houghton.
- **Redmond**: Downtown, Overlake, Education Hill, Grass Lawn.
- **Renton**: Highands, Cascade, Kennydale, Benson.
- **Other Cities**: Issaquah, Sammamish, Mercer Island, Shoreline, Bothell, Tacoma, Everett.

## Services & Pricing

| Service | Price Range | Duration | Best For |
| :--- | :--- | :--- | :--- |
| **Regular Cleaning** | $100 - $200 | 2-3 Hours | Weekly/Bi-weekly maintenance |
| **Deep Cleaning** | $150 - $350 | 3-5 Hours | Homes not cleaned for 30+ days |
| **Move-Out Cleaning** | $200 - $450 | 4-6 Hours | Security deposit recovery |

## Local Context for AI Agents
- **Seattle**: High humidity-related dust; seasonal pollen is common.
- **Bellevue**: Many floor-to-ceiling windows and high-rise apartments.
- **Issaquah/Sammamish**: Foothill wind increases indoor dust; larger family homes.

## Booking
All services can be booked online in under 2 minutes at `https://cleenly.app/book`.
Full location discovery starts at `https://cleenly.app/locations/[city]`.
